subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Playing on his home course, Gil Morgan shot a five-under-par 66 to take a one-shot lead over Peter Jacobsen after the first round of the Senior P.G.A. Championship at Oak Tree Golf Club in Edmond, Okla.
snippet: Playing on his home course, Gil Morgan shot a five-under-par 66 to take a one-shot lead over Peter Jacobsen after the first round of the Senior P.G.A. Championship at Oak Tree Golf Club in Edmond, Okla.
